subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Enough of the BS
author: Rj
full_text:
--0-476146878-1275056751=:13396
Content-Type: text/plain; charset=utf-8
Content-Transfer-Encoding: quoted-printable

Same here - I have said=C2=A0 (several=C2=A0 times before) that since I hav=
e no results I consider can only be explained paranormally, I have not post=
ed them.=C2=A0 As soon as I=C2=A0 get those, I will post them.=C2=A0 But I =
don't see the point of me just posting stuff to say 'me too!', or to follow=
 the crowd, or to try to fit in.=C2=A0 I am not disparaging those who have =
those results, and do post them.=C2=A0 And since this is a discussion,group=
, it seems we should be able to discuss them, and question, and make sugges=
tions.

Civilly.

Also, Misty, there is more to 'research' than everybody d=
oing and saying the same thing.=C2=A0 Even in what might seem a well-scoped=
 area of study, people can be at different levels of knowledge, or interest=
, or focus.=C2=A0 Some people here are interested mostly in the hardware.=
=C2=A0 Some have no interest or talent there, and focus on using the techno=
logy.=C2=A0 Some stand back some, looking at process, controls, quality ass=
urance.=C2=A0 Some may just be interested in the psychic or paranormal comp=
onents.=C2=A0 Some may be more interested in the "Is there anything there" =
question.=C2=A0 Some, "I know something's there, but what is it?".=C2=A0 So=
me "I know there are ghosts there, what do they want?".=C2=A0 Some, "I know=
 what they want, how can I help?".=C2=A0 And so on.

One person giving thei=
r perspective, in a different focus, or a different opinion, is not, "crap"=
, or "wasting time".=C2=A0=C2=A0 It should be seen as healthy, helping a sc=
ience stretch and check, redirect or confirm,=C2=A0 grow and explore.=C2=A0=
 To swat that down is a source of the negativity.=C2=A0 And if you are conc=
erned about negative comments, go back and read the threads, and see who is=
 actually making the insults.

But, to make what I consider a positive sugg=
estion, I would suggest people stop insulting others with different opinion=
s, and allow civil discussion, and consider that none of us knows it all, a=
nd can still learn things from others.=C2=A0 In fact, I hope that is the re=
al purpose of the group.



--- On Fri, 5/28/10, April Abercrombie <april@a=
bercrombieghostresearch.com> wrote:

From: April Abercrombie <april@abercro=
mbieghostresearch.com>
Subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Enough of the BS
To: EVP-ITC@=
yahoogroups.com
Date: Friday, May 28, 2010, 7:03 AM







=C2=A0



  


 =
   
      
      
      Mind you, it hasn't been too many, because I don't =
get many EVP's that I deem worthy enough to put up as evidence.

My sole pu=
rpose with this whole volley this last few days was to try and convince Fra=
nk that I am not picking on him or his research by being skeptical. If I wh=
ere just here to tear him apart, I would be commenting on everything he pos=
ts.



On Fri, May 28, 2010 at 7:33 AM, April Abercrombie <april@abercrombi=
egh ostresearch. com> wrote:

Who are you referring to? I have shared a few=
 EVP's with this group asking what they hear. I do this 
every time I get a=
n EVP. I post them to all my groups, not just this one.

On Thu, May 27, 20=
10 at 10:51 PM, bulletbabea <bulletbabea@ yahoo.com> wrote:















=


=C2=A0



  


    
      
      
      



You know its kind of humorous=
 for me that those who have the desire to "discuss" thier different views a=
re often the ones who do the least amount of actual research... as long as =
you have been in this group not once have you shared one evp. If you did th=
en please refresh my memory. This seems to more about commenting on what ot=
hers share for you than it is about doing any research yourself. Im not sur=
e what you are looking for, if you are here to learn, correspond, or if you=
 are just here to get a rise out of others but to be honest I do not have t=
ime for it. 





Whether Frank bans anyone or not is up to him entirely. B=
ut I have warned you before and I am saying it again. Cut the crap and move=
 on. That goes for ALL of you. I dont mind discussions, I dont mind differe=
nces of opinion but I do mind BS. 





If you have research to share then =
do so, if your research yeilds no results then state it as such. If your on=
ly purpose for being in this group is to question others, disect them, and =
cause negative discussions then perhaps you are wasting your time here. You=
 are definitely wasting mine.





Misty





    
     

    
    






 =
